document_data.name: ''Moon's Circlet''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Moon's circlet''''' and an enchanted [[cleric]]'s [[circlet]] from [[Waterdeep]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Moon's circlet'' was a band of shaped [[silver]]y metal, with its front arrowing down in a V-shape.
document_data.Powers: ''Moon's circlet'' allowed the wearer to cast the ''[[cure wounds]]'' spell, extending their healing capabilities.
